kpi.name: MGW_357a

kpi_info.title: Frames discarded to EPD on egress
kpi_info.use: Total frames discarded to EPD on egress. The total number of frames (AAL5 packets) that Early Packet Discard (EPD) discards. EPD counts discarded AAL5 frames, that is, the packet objects to which EPD discarding refers.

kpi.kpi_alias: Frames discarded to EPD on egress
